Here is the list of signs at $line, along with their scores and descriptions:

2. Taurus - 8/10 - Reliable and practical, but can be stubborn and resistant to change.

4. Cancer - 9/10 - Nurturing and emotional, but also moody and protective of loved ones.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confident and charismatic, but also prideful and demanding attention.
6. Virgo - 7/10 - Analytical and hardworking, but also perfectionistic and critical.
7. Libra - 9/10 - Diplomatic and social, but also indecisive and people-pleasing.
8. Scorpio - 8/10 - Passionate and intense, but also private and secretive.
9. Sagittarius - 6/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, but also reckless and blunt.
10. Capricorn - 7/10 - Disciplined and responsible, but also serious and critical.
11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Humanitarian and independent, but also unconventional and rebellious.
